properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 29 at 2:14PM MST until March 2 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW AT TIMES WILL IMPACT AREAS ALONG AND
WEST OF THE LARAMIE RANGE SUNDAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING...

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Some blowing snow possible. Total
snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. East winds gusting as high
as 35 mph.

* WHERE...The northern Snowy Range Foothills, including Interstate
80 northwest of Laramie.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Transportation may be severely impacted with snow
covered roads...drifting snow and poor visibility. Plan on
slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY
